query.querystr: stmt s, s1,s2; call ca; constant c; read r; print pn; stmt n, n1,n2; if ifs, ifs1; while w; variable v,v1,v2; assign a,a1; procedure p,p1,p2,p3; Select <ifs, r, a, ca, ifs1, pn, v1, n1, p, c> pattern a("doesnotexist",_) and ifs ( v, _, _ ) and w ( _, _) such that Parent*(ifs1,r) and Next*(ca, n2) and Affects(a,a1) and Modifies(s2, v1) and Follows(n,n1) and Uses(s,v2) and Calls(p,p1) with p2.procName = p3.procName with c.value = 1
